hadiths.text: Jabir bin Abdullah narrated:'Mu'adh bin Jabal would pray Al-Maghrib with the Messenger of Allah, then he would return to his people to lead them (in prayer)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الَّذِي يُصَلِّي الْفَرِيضَةَ ثُمَّ يَؤُمُّ النَّاسَ بَعْدَ مَا صَلَّى
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The One Who Prays The Obligatory Prayer, Then Leads The People In Prayer After That
